caption.p: Histopathological changes in lung tissue following essential oil inhalation. Hematoxylin and eosin staining of tissues (B) in rats exposed to essential oil phytoncide inhalation (100 kg/cm 3) or (A) normal (control) Sprague-Dawley rats over 4 weeks of treatment were observed under a microscope (magnification, Ã—400).
